title: "Dashboard for NY NOAA data"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(flexdashboard)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

* Data of NY NOAA in year 2007
```{r}
data("ny_noaa")

ny_noaa=
  ny_noaa %>% 
  slice_sample(n=4000) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  separate(date,into = c("year","month","day")) %>%
  mutate(year=as.integer(year),
         month=month.name[as.numeric(month)],
         day=as.numeric(day),
         prcp=as.numeric(prcp)/10,
         tmax=as.numeric(tmax)/10,
         tmin=as.numeric(tmin)/10) %>% 
  filter(year==2007) %>% 
  select(-id,-snwd)
ny_noaa
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
### Plot 1: Tmax(C) VS Tmin(C) for the year 2007
```{r}
ny_noaa %>% 
  mutate(text_label=str_c("month:", month)) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~ tmin, 
    y = ~ tmax, 
    color = ~ month, 
    type = "scatter", 
    mode = "markers", 
    colors="viridis",
    text = ~ text_label,
    alpha = 0.5
    )
```
Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
### Plot 2: tmin(C) distribution for the year 2007
```{r}
ny_noaa %>% 
  plot_ly(
    y = ~ tmin, 
    x = ~ month, 
    color = ~ month, 
    text = ~ month, 
    type = "box", 
    colors = "viridis")
```

### Plot 3: Recorded distribution in each month for 2007
```{r}
ny_noaa %>% 
  drop_na(month) %>%
  count(month) %>% 
  mutate(month = fct_reorder(month, n)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~month, 
          y = ~n, 
          color = ~month, 
          type = "bar")
```
